Title: Killer Within
Writer: Frank Darabont (developed by), Robert Kirkman (series of graphic novels), Tony Moore (series of graphic novels), Charlie Adlard (series of graphic novels), Sang Kyu Kim
Actors: Andrew Lincoln, Sarah Wayne Callies, Laurie Holden, Norman Reedus
Plot: Lori goes into labour when the prison comes under attack. Michonne tries to convince Andrea to leave Woodbury.
